author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOOD THREAT TO CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE TENNESSEE VALLEY AND SOUTHEAST...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOOD THREAT TO CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE TENNESSEE VALLEY AND SOUTHEAST...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Fri Sep 13
 the center of Francine was located near 35.5, -91.8
 with movement SE at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 15 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Francine (AT1/AL062024)
